product_name: VP Components VXe Series Mountain SPD Pedals - 2014 Overstock
long_description: With heat-treated chromoly axles for strength, and crisp cleat engagement, the VXe pedals are ideal for off-road and urban riders who want an economical pedal to handle the rigors of everyday riding.
short_description: With heat-treated chromoly axles for strength, and crisp cleat engagement, the VXe pedals are ideal for off-road and urban riders who want an economical pedal to handle the rigors of everyday riding.
